name: Clin N Cervix
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:** FIGO Stage IIIB is assigned based on primary tumor extension and/or regional lymph node involvement. If it is unknown whether it is based on extension or regional lymph node involvement, assign to regional lymph nodes (N).  

**Note 3:**  If either exploratory or definitive surgery is done with no mention of lymph nodes, assume nodes are negative.

**Note 4:**  If the clinician says "adnexa palpated" but does not mention lymph nodes, assume lymph nodes are not involved.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Iliac, NOS:
       Common
       External
       Internal (hypogastric)
           Obturator
    Paracervical
    Parametrial
    Pelvic, NOS
    Sacral, NOS:
       Lateral (laterosacral)
       Middle (promontorial) (Gerota's node)
       Presacral
       Uterosacral
rows: Regional lymph node(s)  cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

FIGO Stage IIIB based on lymph node involvement

FIGO Stage IIIB with no other information on extension or regional lymph nodes

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
